projects:
[{'title': 'War and Peace Talk', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'description': 'I set up War and Peace Talk to make perspectives on complex conflict situations more understandable for a young lay audience by providing attractive video-interviews. These interviews are based on questions contributed through social media and seek to do justice to the complexity of the subject matter, while avoiding unnecessary jargon.

Interviewees so far included Mary Kaldor (Professor, LSE), Dan Smith (SG, International Alert), Irene Khan (SG, International Development Law Organization), Arjan Hehenkamp (Director, MSF NL), and Amos Guiora (Professor, University of Utah).
 
Please do get in touch if you have ideas for speakers or topics or if you want to contribute in any way!', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Bruno', 'last_name': 'Braak', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Socio-Legal Postdoctoral Researcher at Van Vollenhoven Institute for Law, Governance and Society'}]}]
